short_summary: Purchase of office furniture for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) in Woodstock, New Brunswick to meet the security requirements of the site.
description: The CBSA requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for its site in Woodstock, New Brunswick.  The furniture will be required to be delivered and installed in four phases.  The security requirements of the site must be met.
full_summary:
====================================
## Title: 
EB129-240512 - Office Furniture, CBSA - Woodstock, NB

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Woodstock, New Brunswick, Atlantic Region by February 7, 2024.

## Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: WS4221869169
* Publication Date: September 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 17, 2023, 2:00:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: October 12, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 18, 2016
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Tender Details
* Category: Goods
* Description: Office furniture
* Product Categories:
	+ Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
	+ Freestanding height adjustable desk/table products
	+ Metal filing and storage cabinets
	+ Ancillary and lighting products
* Security Requirement: Yes
* Delivery Schedule: Four phases, starting from January 17, 2024, to February 7, 2024

## Eligibility Requirements
* Contractors must possess a valid Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) contract
* Contractors are required to be regular suppliers or pre-qualified holders of a PSPC contract

## Evaluation Criteria
* Lowest price

## How to Participate
* Visit the PSPC website and follow the link to the tender notice: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17504852

Notice of Interest 
-------------------

If you are interested in participating in this tender, please visit the PSPC website and take the following steps:

1.  Register for a PSPC account if you do not already have one
2.  Search for the tender notice (EB129-240512)
3.  Review the tender documents and follow the instructions for submission

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact:
Kristelle Leblanc, 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
